entry.title: a2x/cs2-dumper
entry.summary:
Counter-Strike 2 Offset/Interfaces Dumper

CS2 Dumper

Tool to automatically dump offsets and interfaces for Counter-Strike: 2.

Generated Files

Generated files are stored in the generated directory.

ğŸ“‚ Pre-generated Files

License

Please refer to the LICENSE file for more details.

entry.title: casey/runestone
entry.summary:
Runes: terrible idea or idÃ©e terrible?

runestone

Warning

runestone implements runes, a fungible token protocol for Bitcoin.

Fungible tokens are, without exaggeration and nearly without exception, a vile abyss of hopium, scams, and incompetence.

Runes are no different.

If you want to make money, buy bitcoin.
